Class AbstractBankAccount

java.lang.Object
com.nbicocchi.exercises.oop.bankaccount.AbstractBankAccount
All Implemented Interfaces:
BankAccount
Direct Known Subclasses:
BankAccountEasy, BankAccountPro
public abstract class AbstractBankAccount extends Object implements BankAccount
Abstract implementation of the BankAccount interface

    • AbstractBankAccount

      public AbstractBankAccount(String IBAN, double balance, double operationFee, double interestRate)
      Construct a new BankAccount
      Parameters:
      IBAN - the IBAN of the account
      balance - the initial balance of the account
      operationFee - the fee to be applied to deposit and withdraw operations
      interestRate - the interest rate to be applied

      Specified by:

    • setIBAN

      public void setIBAN(String IBAN)
      Sets the IBAN. Only compliant formats are allowed. An IBAN is valid if its length is comprised between [8, 34] and its first two chars are uppercase letters.
      Specified by:
      setIBAN in interface BankAccount
      Parameters:
      IBAN - the IBAN to be set.

      public void deposit(double amount)

    • withdraw

      public double withdraw(double amount)
      Withdraw an amount from the account. No fees are applied.
      Specified by:

    • transfer

      public double transfer(BankAccount other, double amount)
      Transfers and amount on a different account. Fees are applied according to the specific rules of each account.
      Specified by:
      transfer in interface BankAccount
      Parameters:

      amount - the amount to be transferred
